directions: In a medium bowl, mix the cream cheese, Worcestershire sauce and hot pepper sauce. Spread the mixture on a medium serving platter. Top with cocktail sauce, and layer with shrimp. Cover the shrimp with green onions, tomato and mozzarella cheese.
ingredients: 2 (6 ounce) containers shrimp, rinsed and drained
title: Shrimp Appetizer
